amendment.description: Amendment reduces the authorization level for fiscal year 1997 appropriations for international affairs programs by $478 million to conform with the authorization levels established by the balanced budget resolution.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 5 in the Congressional Record of May 22, to reduce funds authorized in the bill by an additional $478 million from a variety of foreign aid and State Department accounts to bring the funding totals in compliance with the budget resolution.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Brownback amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 276 - 134 (Roll no. 348).
